title: Integrated Multimodal Learning Course for Temporal Information Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Requires content structured for smartphone-based learning, emphasizing connectivity to professionals' work contexts

learning_goals: Learners will be able to analyze cases involving temporal information (sequence, duration, simultaneity) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners will be able to reconstruct temporal situations with 70% or higher accuracy by integrating auditory explanations and visual arrow representations.
Learners will be able to explain effective strategies for utilizing both representational modes when processing temporal information.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
